refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
Interface: org.freedesktop.ConsoleKit.Seat
Methods: GetId (out OBJECT_PATH sid) ActivateSession (in OBJECT_PATH ssid) GetActiveSession (out OBJECT_PATH ssid) GetSessions (out OBJECT_PATH ARRAY sessions)
Signals: SessionAdded (STRING ssid) SessionRemoved (STRING ssid) ActiveSessionChanged (STRING ssid)
